title: Promo Code
description: Widget that allows you to apply an iVector Promo Code to your booking

Title.description: Title displayed at the top of the widget.

Message.default: If you have a promotion code, please enter it in the field below and click update to re-price your booking.
Message.description: Messaged displayed below the title that explains what this widget is to the user.

InvalidCodeWarning.description: Warning displayed if the user attempts to apply an invalid promo code.

ApplyButton.title: Button
